title: ISic002925. Epitaph of Martinus, a coachman
body:
Facsimile Images

1cross_uninterpretedMEM[.]RIA
2MARTINICAR
3PENTAR.PA
4TRICIOROM

Apparatus criticus

Text of Korhonen 2010 ; Manganaro: carpentari q(uondam) or carpentariq(ue)

English translation

In memory of Martinus, coachman to the patricians

commentary

Korhonen 2010: n.23 justifies reading carpentario in line 3 on the grounds that such a mixture of cases is attested in other examples.

bibliography

  • 1951.0175 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Bernabò Brea NSA 1947 189 no.1 fig.13 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Agnello 1950 222 no.8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002212
  • Manganaro 1993 585 no.5 fig.27 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001827
  • Korhonen 2010 121 no.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001896
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
